commentList.translatedContent: The location and the room are very good! The little friend at the front desk is attentive and enthusiastic. After checking in, he will take the initiative to inform the location of the slippers in the room, and help to connect to the wireless connection. The room is very clean. I recommend everyone to experience the punch.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, hello, it must be a special fate that allowed us to meet. Thank you for your thoughtful comments and pictures for publicity. I really want to thank you for your hard work. The details show the best team! It is a great honor for us to receive your strong recognition. Thank you very much for your satisfaction with the hotel and your praise and encouragement to our staff! I will definitely share this good news with them. I believe that our employees will be very motivated. I hope you will continue to choose us next time. We will also bring you different surprises and touches, hee hee! See you soon! The new year is coming, I wish you a happy new year in advance!

commentList.translatedContent:
The room was clean and the service was very good and polite.
There was no hot water in the room temporarily in the middle of the night, so we immediately dealt with a new room card and let us go to rest~
It is highly recommended to stay with Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan documents.

commentList.translatedContent: The newly opened Huange Hotel under Huazhu Group in Sanlitun is suitable for young people and families with low budgets. The facilities are basically complete and hygienic, as well as smart homes. The fly in the ointment is that the sound insulation is somewhat poor.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience. If you stay next time, you can call the front desk in advance to help you reserve a room with better sound insulation, and look forward to your next stay!

commentList.translatedContent: Hotel booked for watching a play at the Poly Theater. The location is very convenient. Yuru at the front desk was very efficient at check-in and check-out, friendly and professional. The hotel design is very human and suitable for business travel. In the evening, the takeaway was delivered by a robot to the door of the room, so there was no need to go downstairs to get it.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you very much for your comments on the hotel in your busy schedule. We are really touched to see your sincere and patient comments. Time will tell us, simply like the most long-term, ordinary company is the most reassuring, and understand you the warmest

commentList.translatedContent: Xiaoyu's partner hotel, in order to watch Rumeng, I stayed for a long time this time, but it was very comfortable. The hotel service was very good, very friendly, and the breakfast was delicious. After watching the drama, I thoughtfully prepared a late night snack. Happy to stay here.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. commentList.translatedContent: Thank you for the little warmth prepared by the hotel. People who travel alone will feel at home in the first stop of a strange city! Beijing dream trip is perfect!

commentList.translatedContent: This is the first time I stayed at this hotel. It only opened in October last year. It is very new. There are not many rooms in the hotel, all basic functions are available, very energetic, and the price is very high. The only downside is that it's not very close to the subway station.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.translatedContent:
The location is very good. It takes 5-8 minutes to walk to Sanlitun. The facade of the hotel is very inconspicuous. It needs a little observation, but the service is great. The front desk helped me upgrade the room. Happy~
The room is not big but the layout is reasonable, the cleaning is quite attentive and clean. The delivery robot is very cute. It can not only deliver takeaways, but also gave me a bottle of styling water (the little brother and sister at the front desk are you who noticed my hair that was messed up by the wind haha!) Although the room faces the road, it has good sound insulation. In short, it is the king of cost performance in the Sanlitun area.

commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very good, stay on the side of the road, just a five-minute walk from Taikoo Li Sanlitun, it is very quiet at night, a good choice for quietness in the middle of the noise, the room design is good, the front desk and room staff are very friendly

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel's trendy design style, young people's trendy style, special style. There is a small wooden horse in the lobby, as well as free popping candy. The front desk service is very enthusiastic. After the check-in, the front desk will send me to the room. Nice~ The TV in the room is very large, and it feels very good to watch dramas. The whole room is very spacious, and there is wireless charging, which is great! Specifically, Sanlitun Taikoo Li is also very close, and it is very convenient to go shopping. Breakfast is a special car in Nice, I recommend everyone to check in!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO, German bath, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattress, down bedding... CitiGO always adheres to high quality standards in terms of sleep and bath. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: When I came to Beijing for business, I was surprised and surprised by the room given by my friend. First of all, the location is very easy to find, just next to Taikoo Li. The room is clean and tidy without peculiar smell. There is also a small tea table. The service attitude of the staff is very good, no matter what requests and questions you have, they will answer them politely. Stayed one night and felt that their bedding was very comfortable, the pillows and duvet were down. It's very comfortable, and the experience of staying is full!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: I came to Beijing to play and wanted to choose a hotel near Taikoo Li Sanlitun. I chose this hotel, and I was not disappointed. Letâ€™s talk about the location first. It only takes seven minutes to walk to Taikoo Li, and the opposite is Yaolai Center. In terms of hygiene, the cleaning is very meticulous and clean. In terms of service: the staff has a very good attitude and is very considerate. After checking in, they help to send the luggage to the room. Their little robot is also very cute and very satisfied.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for staying at CitiGO Hotel Taikoo Li Sanlitun. Your recognition is the greatest encouragement to us. CitiGO will always strive to do better. Travel around the hotel is more convenient. It is very close to Beijing Embassy District and Workers Stadium. The best place to stay for entertainment, looking forward to meeting you~

The location of the hotel is good. It takes only 5 minutes to walk to Taikoo Li, and there is a place to eat downstairs. There are also childhood popping candy in the lobby. The front desk Oda has good service and gave a small gift during the formalities. The room is also more comfortable and smart. It should be human-sensing. You don't need to insert a card to get electricity, and the mobile phone can control the air conditioner, lights, and curtains. Great staying experience!

feedbackList.translatedContent: The front desk helped me carry my luggage and take a taxi, very enthusiastic, it made me feel like home, and I will come again next time

commentList.translatedContent: Hotel location and environment are very good

commentList.translatedContent: Originally, the king-sized bed room was flooded after taking a shower on the first night. In the middle of the night, he told us to change rooms for us. We changed to a smaller room. Is there a refund for the price difference?

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you very much for your comments on the hotel in spite of your busy schedule. I am sorry that I did not give you a good check-in experience. The staff involved in this handover resigned. The manager on duty received feedback as soon as possible and started to help you immediately solve. We will also contact you as soon as possible to refund the price difference. I also hope that your next stay will bring you a different feeling. Time will tell us that simple love is the longest, ordinary companionship is the most reassuring, and people who understand you are the warmest

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very small, with only a small sofa, no stools, no place to hang clothes, no windows, and the most painful thing is that there is no air-conditioning. The room is very hot and breathless. I wake up many times at night and think about living. Forget it one night, but the service is pretty good

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear host, thank you very much for such a detailed review in your busy schedule. Every customer's needs are the direction we sincerely strive for. CitiGO has always been adhering to the principle of "sincere and dedicated to creating luxurious enjoyment, cleanliness and safety for each guest." We strive to provide our guests with a perfect stay experience! The room types of the hotel are different, and the layout is also different. Room A of the big bed room has limited space and belongs to the darkroom. We failed to remind you in time. It is our lack of service. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused to you! Looking forward to your next stay, wish you a happy life!

commentList.translatedContent: The whole layout is very poor, the room is not very clean

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO! Sorry for the bad check-in experience. Your comments and suggestions have been received. We will verify it as soon as possible

commentList.translatedContent: Very bad, the actual situation is much worse than the picture

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests: First of all, I am very sorry for not giving you a good check-in experience. As a hotel manager, I am very sorry. The pictures displayed in the hotel are all taken in real scenes, and the equipment and facilities are integrated with intelligent guest control, which brings travelers High-quality check-in experience, I don't know the reason for not giving you a perfect experience, you can directly feedback to the staff on duty next time, I believe that I and any of my partners will give you a perfect solution, I would like to thank you again We apologize and sincerely look forward to seeing you again!

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel lady service is very good ğŸ‘

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
